languages.text: Attacks of this rifle inflict the bloodblight effect on the target. Bloodblight: at the beginning of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} all creatures in a 2-cell radius suffer the bloodblight effect. If these creatures suffer impact, piercing, or {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g}, they also suffer an additional +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).

traits.locale_text: Attacks of this rifle inflict the bloodblight {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect }effect{/g} on the target. Bloodblight: at the beginning of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} all creatures in a 2-cells radius suffer the bloodblight effect. If these creatures suffer impact, piercing, or {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g}, they also suffer an additional +4 direct damage and {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).

Attacks of this rifle inflict the bloodblight effect on the target. Bloodblight: at the beginning of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} all creatures in a 2-cell radius suffer the bloodblight effect. If these creatures suffer impact, piercing, or {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g}, they also suffer an additional +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).

Attacks of this rifle inflict the bloodblight effect on the target. Bloodblight: at the beginning of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} all creatures in a 2-cell radius suffer the bloodblight effect. If these creatures suffer impact, piercing, or {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g}, they also suffer an additional +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).

languages.text: 这把步枪在命中目标时，会对目标施加“血疫”效果。 血疫：目标{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，2格内所有生物都会受到“血疫”效果影响。当受到“血疫”效果影响的生物受到冲击、穿刺或{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}撕裂伤害{/g}时，还会额外受到4点{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}，并承受{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}（4）效果。
languages.original_text: Attacks of this rifle inflict the bloodblight effect on the target. Bloodblight: at the beginning of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} all creatures in a 2-cell radius suffer the bloodblight effect. If these creatures suffer impact, piercing, or {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g}, they also suffer an additional +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).

traits.locale_text: 这把步枪在命中目标时，会对目标施加“血疫”{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect }效果{/g}。 血疫：目标{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，2格内所有生物都会受到“血疫”效果影响。当受到“血疫”效果影响的生物受到冲击、穿刺或{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}撕裂伤害{/g}时，还会额外受到4点直击伤害，并承受{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}（4）效果。

languages.text: Выстрелы из этой винтовки накладывают на цель эффект "заражение крови". Заражение крови: в начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} цели все существа в радиусе 2 клеток получают эффект "заражение крови". Получая ударный, пронзающий или {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}раздирающий урон{/g}, они также получают +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g} дополнительно и эффект {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} (4).
languages.original_text: Attacks of this rifle inflict the bloodblight effect on the target. Bloodblight: at the beginning of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} all creatures in a 2-cell radius suffer the bloodblight effect. If these creatures suffer impact, piercing, or {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g}, they also suffer an additional +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).

traits.locale_text: Выстрелы из этой винтовки накладывают на цель {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect }эффект{/g} "заражение крови". Заражение крови: в начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} цели все существа в радиусе 2 клеток получают эффект "заражение крови". Получая {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}ударный{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}пронзающий{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}раздирающий урон{/g}, они также получают +4 прямого урона дополнительно и эффект {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} (4).

Выстрелы из этой винтовки накладывают на цель {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect }эффект{/g} "заражение крови". Заражение крови: в начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} цели все существа в радиусе 2 клеток получают эффект "заражение крови". Получая {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}ударный{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}пронзающий{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}раздирающий урон{/g}, они также получают +4 прямого урона дополнительно и эффект {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} (4).

languages.text: このライフルの攻撃はターゲットにブラッドブライトの効果を与える。 ブラッドブライト：ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、周囲2セル以内の全ての生物はブラッドブライトの効果を受ける。これらの生物が衝撃、貫通、または{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}裂傷ダメージ{/g}を受けた場合、さらに+4の{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}と出血{/g}(4)を受ける
languages.original_text: Attacks of this rifle inflict the bloodblight effect on the target. Bloodblight: at the beginning of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} all creatures in a 2-cell radius suffer the bloodblight effect. If these creatures suffer impact, piercing, or {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g}, they also suffer an additional +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).

traits.locale_text: このライフルの攻撃はターゲットにブラッドブライトの{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect }効果{/g}を与える。 ブラッドブライト：ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、周囲2セル以内の全ての生物はブラッドブライトの効果を受ける。これらの生物が衝撃、貫通、または{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}裂傷ダメージ{/g}を受けた場合、さらに＋4の直接ダメージと{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}(4)を受ける。

languages.text: Los ataques de este rifle infligen el efecto sangre maldita al objetivo. Sangre maldita: al principio del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del objetivo todas las criaturas en un radio de 2 casillas sufren el efecto de sangre maldita. Si esas criaturas sufren {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}daño acerado{/g}, de impacto o perforante, también sufren +4 de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} (4).
languages.original_text: Attacks of this rifle inflict the bloodblight effect on the target. Bloodblight: at the beginning of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} all creatures in a 2-cell radius suffer the bloodblight effect. If these creatures suffer impact, piercing, or {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g}, they also suffer an additional +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).

traits.locale_text: Los ataques de este rifle infligen el {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect }efecto{/g} sangre maldita al objetivo. Sangre maldita: al principio del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del objetivo todas las criaturas en un radio de 2 casillas sufren el efecto de sangre maldita. Si esas criaturas sufren {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}daño acerado{/g}, de impacto o perforante, también sufren +4 de daño directo y {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} (4).

languages.text: Angriffe dieses Gewehrs belegen das Ziel mit dem Blutrausch-Effekt. Blutrausch: Zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Ziels erleiden alle Kreaturen in einem Radius von 2 Feldern den Blutrausch-Effekt. Wenn diese Kreaturen Schlag-, durchdringenden oder {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rüstungsbrechenden Schaden{/g} erleiden, wird ihnen zusätzlich +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} (4) hinzugefügt.
languages.original_text: Attacks of this rifle inflict the bloodblight effect on the target. Bloodblight: at the beginning of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} all creatures in a 2-cell radius suffer the bloodblight effect. If these creatures suffer impact, piercing, or {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g}, they also suffer an additional +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).

traits.locale_text: Angriffe dieses Gewehrs fügen dem Ziel den Blutrausch-{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect }Effekt{/g} zu. Blutrausch: Zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Ziels erleiden alle Kreaturen in einem 2-Felder-Radius den Blutrausch-Effekt. Wenn diese Kreaturen Aufprall-, Durchdringungs- oder {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rüstungsbrechenden Schaden{/g} erleiden, wird ihnen zusätzlich +4 Direktschaden und {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} (4) hinzugefügt.

languages.text: Les attaques exécutées avec ce fusil infligent l'effet Fléau sanglant à la cible. Fléau sanglant : au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de la cible, toutes les créatures présentes dans un rayon de 2 cases subissent l'effet Fléau sanglant. Si ces créatures subissent des dégâts d'impact, des dégâts perforants ou des {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}dégâts de lacération{/g}, elles subissent également +4 points de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g} supplémentaires et l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} (4).
languages.original_text: Attacks of this rifle inflict the bloodblight effect on the target. Bloodblight: at the beginning of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} all creatures in a 2-cell radius suffer the bloodblight effect. If these creatures suffer impact, piercing, or {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g}, they also suffer an additional +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).

traits.locale_text: Les attaques menées à l'aide de ce fusil infligent l'{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect }effet{/g} Fléau Sanglant à la cible. Fléau Sanglant : au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de la cible, toutes les créatures présentes dans un rayon de 2 cases subissent l'effet Fléau Sanglant. Si ces créatures subissent des dégâts d'impact, des dégâts perçants ou des {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}dégâts perforants{/g}, elles subissent également +4 points de dégâts directs supplémentaires et l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} (4).

languages.text: Bu tüfekle yapılan saldırılar hedefte kan küfü etkisi yaratır. Kan Küfü: Hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başlangıcında 2 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan tüm yaratıklar, kan küfü etkisine maruz kalırlar. Bu yaratıklar darbe, delme veya {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}yırtma{/g} hasarına uğrarlarsa ilave +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}doğrudan hasar{/g} alır ve {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g} (4) geçirirler.
languages.original_text: Attacks of this rifle inflict the bloodblight effect on the target. Bloodblight: at the beginning of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} all creatures in a 2-cell radius suffer the bloodblight effect. If these creatures suffer impact, piercing, or {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g}, they also suffer an additional +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).
